function.name: SNMPGet
function.function-prolog: This function performs a SNMP get request

function-arg-def.name: snmpHost
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server SNMP hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: snmpUser
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: SNMP user used for v3 requests

function-arg-def.name: snmpSecurityLevel
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: SNMP security level used for v3 requests

function-arg-def.name: snmpSecurityFile
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Path to the SNMP security file

function-arg-def.name: snmpStatus
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected status of the SNMP request

function-arg-def.name: snmpValidOIDs
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Check if the values returned for the OIDs are correct

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.call: { 'name' : 'SNMP Get' , 'command' : '%s/bin/java' % JAVA_HOME , 'arguments' : '%s %s' % (STAFCmd, STAFCmdParams) , 'location' : location , 'path' : '%s/%s/snmp' % (DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_DIR, relativeJavaDir), 'env' : env , 'expectedRC' : expectedRC }

function.name: SNMPSet
function.function-prolog: This function performs a SNMP Set request

function-arg-def.name: snmpHost
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server SNMP hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: snmpUser
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: SNMP user used for v3 requests

function-arg-def.name: snmpSecurityLevel
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: SNMP security level used for v3 requests

function-arg-def.name: snmpSecurityFile
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Path to the SNMP security file

function-arg-def.name: snmpStatus
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected status of the SNMP request

function-arg-def.name: snmpValidOIDs
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Check if the values returned for the OIDs are correct

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.call: { 'name' : 'SNMP Set' , 'command' : '%s/bin/java' % JAVA_HOME , 'arguments' : '%s %s' % (STAFCmd, STAFCmdParams) , 'location' : location , 'path' : '%s/%s/snmp' % (DIRECTORY_INSTANCE_DIR, relativeJavaDir), 'env' : env , 'expectedRC' : expectedRC }

function.name: SNMPTrapListener
function.function-prolog: This function performs a SNMP Set request

function-arg-def.name: outputFile
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: File to which the output should be written

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.call: { 'name' : 'SNMP Trap Listener' , 'command' : '%s/bin/java' % JAVA_HOME , 'arguments' : '%s %s' % (STAFCmd, STAFCmdParams) , 'location' : location , 'path' : snmpPath , 'env' : env , 'outputFile' : outputFile , 'expectedRC' : expectedRC }

function.name: restartSNMPConnectionHandler
function.function-prolog: This function restart the SNMP Connection Handler using dsconfig

function-arg-def.name: dsInstanceHost
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0. Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

sequence.call: { 'name' : 'Disable the SNMP Connection Handler' , 'location' : location , 'command' : STAFCmd , 'arguments' : '%s --set enabled:false' % STAFCmdParams , 'expectedRC': expectedRC }
{ 'name' : 'Enable the SNMP Connection Handler' , 'location' : location , 'command' : STAFCmd , 'arguments' : '%s --set enabled:true' % STAFCmdParams , 'expectedRC': expectedRC }

function-arg-def.name: snmpHost
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Directory server hostname or IP address

function-arg-def.name: index
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Index for the out/in bytes check

function-arg-def.name: expectedRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Expected return code value. Default value is 0 Wildcard 'noCheck' to not check the RC

function-arg-def.name: timerRC
function-arg-def.function-arg-description: Return code value of the timer

sequence.message: 'Process TrapListener ended before timer duration: %s' \ % timerDuration
'Process TrapListener still running after timer duration: %s' \ % timerDuration

else.log: 'STAF %s FS GET FILE %s failed with RC=%s Result=%s' % \ (location, outputFile, RC, STAFResult)
